  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Deprecated. 
    As of 4.1, the class name is abbreviated in a way that is not per camel-casing standards and will be renamed in the future.

public final class JCIFSConfig
extends Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
